Hi, I'm going to assume this is a typing error, but it is a little confusing.

Note on the new 'ClockLib' Library.
``` ```
``` ```As of version 3.1
``` ```This is now useable with NpcLib 1.6 (but not 1.5 - check which you have)
``` ```

Note on the new 'NpcLib' Library.
``` ```
``` ```As of version 1.5
``` ```This is now useable with ClockLib 3.1 (but not 3.0 - check which you have)
``` ```
Just thought I'd mention it.
Posts.HTML:
Hi, I'm going to assume this is a typing error, but it is a little confusing.

Note on the new 'ClockLib' Library.

As of version 3.1
This is now useable with NpcLib 1.6 (but not 1.5 - check which you have)

Note on the new 'NpcLib' Library.

As of version 1.5
This is now useable with ClockLib 3.1 (but not 3.0 - check which you have)

Just thought I'd mention it.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks for pointing out, now corrected.
